nodes.text: Caw-crabs were a crustacean crab species that could be found in a zoo on Sarini Island, on the planet Chandrila. During a visit to the zoo in the year 5 ABY, Brentin, Temmin and Norra Wexley witnessed a cast of caw-crabs scuttling and splashing about their enclosures.
Caw-crabs were first mentioned in Aftermath: Life Debt, a novel by Chuck Wendig, which was released on July 12, 2016.
